programme.desc: A conservationist travels to Hawaii for her best friend's wedding, but instead of having a relaxing vacation, she finds herself helping the new hotel manager make changes to his family business.

programme.desc: With help from their best friends, a happy couple plan the perfect wedding at the same place where their romance began.

programme.desc: A woman's engagement plans get thrown into disarray when her fiance's free-spirited brother returns home.

programme.desc: Lt. Callie Jackson returns home after a military tour to find her late grandfather's barbecue joint is struggling, but she has a run-in with a TV director who teaches her that sometimes it's best to look forward instead of looking back.

programme.desc: Working on protecting the wildlife in Africa, a biologist teams up with a theme park designer who wants to create an over-the-top safari attraction.
